articles.description: Embracing streaming was a step in the right direction, but the calendar shift has given distributors an extra two months to get their big-ticket releases into cinemas
articles.content: The most recent Academy Awards ceremony took place on 9 February, the earliest date in the institutions 92-year history, as a calendar-shifting experiment that was largely not embraced by the industr… [+4570 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Topping
articles.title: Jason Manford works for Iceland after Wilmslow Tesco rejection - Warrington Guardian
articles.description: HAVING already been turned down for a job at Tesco Express, Jason Manford is working a shift with one the retailer's rivals instead.
articles.content:
HAVING already been turned down for a job at Tesco Express, Jason Manford is working a shift with one the retailer's rivals instead.
